Overkill has been an integral part of the European and especially the German sneaker and graffiti scene for years. In recent years, the portfolio has been constantly expanded with high-quality brands, so that we are also one of the leading stores in streetwear and apparel. By constantly offering exclusive, limited but also more accessible products, Overkill with its two stores in Berlin - Kreuzberg is the first address when it comes to sneakers, streetwear, or graffiti. Our incomparable sneaker releases and a large satisfied customer base, are reasons for our good standing within the scene. Due to the constant growth of our company, there are always jobs waiting for you. Here you can find our job offers in different areas.

You can expect a responsible and varied job. We offer you a modern workplace and an excellent working atmosphere with a large team of passionate colleagues. With us, you get the opportunity to develop and refine your own activity in a motivating work environment. Our two stores are located in Berlin-Kreuzberg, directly at Schlesisches Tor and our office with warehouse and shipping department is located in Berlin-Marzahn, at S-Bhf Mehrower Allee.Â In addition, we have also opened a retail store in the heart of Cologne and there are also new positions to be filled from time to time.
